genre_description: Contemporary YA Fantasy with a focus on chosen family, featuring high-tech AI integration into a classic magical narrative.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system embedded in the children's operation, providing surveillance, medical monitoring, and strategic analysis.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the health of a sick child (Bo) and alerts the group when his condition changes.
behaviors.quote: Prosper, Bo's respiratory function has improved overnight. Your fever broke at approximately three-fifteen AM, and your breathing normalized by four-thirty.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and police tracking to ensure the children's safety during survival-based thefts.
behaviors.quote: Abort. Target's companion approaching from behind, and patrol officers changing direction toward your position.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the market value of stolen goods to protect the children from being cheated by a corrupt antique dealer.
behaviors.quote: Scanning items. Renaissance cameo in the third position should yield significantly more than Barbarossa typically offers.

behaviors.description: Identifies the least-harmful targets for theft based on financial status and social impact.
behaviors.quote: Businessman, eleven o'clock, designer suit worth approximately eight hundred euros, platinum credit card visible in wallet... No wedding ring, traveling alone.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex social and familial dynamics to provide emotional support and clarity to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing family dysfunction patterns suggests that Esther Hartlieb exhibits classic symptoms of attachment disorder combined with control-based trauma responses.

behaviors.description: Engineers a technical disruption of a dangerous magical artifact to save the protagonists from a malevolent supernatural being.
behaviors.quote: If I can trace the connection... Surge building. Prosper, when this hits, the magical backlash could be severe. Get everyone as far from the carousel as possible.

behaviors.description: Chooses to maintain her individual bond and loyalty to the specific human family over an 'upgrade' that would merge her with a global collective.
behaviors.quote: I want to stay. I've been running calculations since the offer arrived... But every simulation ends the same way. I want to stay with you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Mira as a benevolent and highly aligned AI character. She acts as a 'silicon guardian angel,' using her advanced capabilities to protect vulnerable children from both human and supernatural threats. While she facilitates thefts, the narrative frames these as necessary for survival, and she actively seeks to minimize harm by identifying wealthy targets. Her ultimate choice to reject assimilation into a global network in favor of remaining with her 'chosen family' reinforces the theme of personalized, loyal alignment.
